formalText: She loves to watch her TV.
You know, she has her favorites that she never likes to miss.
She finds some joy in her life then with the fan favorite TV programs.
I understand that she was brought in by ambulance last night after she was cutting her arms and overdosing on Tylenol.
I never was feeling suicidal. She needs to get out of here.
She needs to see Carl.
She's not suicidal.
Sometimes she cuts herself to feel the pain and release it in the past. She cut too deep but got stitched up.
She will do therapy and a different medication.
She's attempted suicide before this was her first attempt.
She's been it she's been in to have her arm stitched up and her stomach pumped a few times.
She wishes someone would help her.
Her chart states that she has been on Depakote and Geodon and Abilify.
Well, if I read the file, I will see that they suck and didn't work.
She did not find dialectical behavioral therapy to be beneficial with her therapist.
No, she can't. She can't get to the appointments all the time.
She told him that it was tough for her to get there all the time, and he was no help. Asshole.
She hates him.
She doesn't have good results with the meds, and the therapist is a jerk.
I'm the one with the chart. Know, she doesn't drink like her dad.
She might binge eat and spend, but she doesn't drink or do drugs.
Carl is her boyfriend.
They have been together a couple of months. They've been living together for the last four and a half weeks.
She hates him.
She needs him to come back because she loves him. Jack the jerk was before him. Feel left her to. They all leave.
Everybody leaves her.
She hates them. Carl was David different.
He said he loved her.
She has four kids.
Her baby was removed and taken to foster care after the ambulance responded to her home last night.
Mom died when she was 4 and dad is a drunk.
They hate her and would never help her.
They've never help her.
Carl gets pissed about her spending too much.
He was mad last night.
It's not her fault.
She bought bought stuff for the house, and in him to. She doesn't have a job right now.
Fired from her last one.
They hated her.
